TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 資料模型中的項目。

span.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目是節點還是原子值。An item is either a node or an atomic value.

block.para:
當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫下列成員： :When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: : -

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化狀態，在這種類型的衍生的類別建構函式會呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsNode As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsNode { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，表示項目是表示 XPath 節點還是原子值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.

value.span: 如果項目表示 XPath 節點，則為 ，如果項目表示原子值，則為 。

span.span: if the item represents an XPath node; if the item represents an atomic value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TypedValue As Object
public: abstract property System::Object ^ TypedValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，根據其結構描述型別取得目前項目，做為最適當的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]型別之 Boxed 物件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

value.span: 目前項目，做為最適當的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 型別之 boxed 物件。

span.span: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目的值無效，無法根據指定的結構描述類型，值屬性就相當於 windows 7屬性。If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the property is equivalent to the value of the property. 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

related.span: System.Xml 類別中的型別支援

span.span: Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得項目的 值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value of the item.
The value of the item.

summary.span: 傳回項目的值，做為指定型別。

span.span: Returns the item's value as the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type returnType) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ValueAs (returnType As Type) As Object
abstract member ValueAs : Type -> obj override this.ValueAs : Type -> obj

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: returnType
param.span: 傳回項目值所做為的型別。

span.span: The type to return the item value as.

summary.span: 傳回項目的值，做為指定型別。

span.span: Returns the item's value as the specified type.

returns.span: 項目值，做為要求的型別。

span.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中覆寫方法會嘗試將項目值轉換成[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定型別。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.

exception.span: 項目值的格式對於目標型別不正確。

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

related.span: System.Xml 類別中的型別支援

span.span: Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object ValueAs (Type returnType, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type returnType, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ValueAs (returnType As Type, nsResolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ ValueAs(Type ^ returnType, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ nsResolver);
abstract member ValueAs : Type * System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver -> obj

param.name: returnType
param.span: 傳回項目值所做為的型別。

span.span: The type to return the item's value as.

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 物件，用於解析命名空間前置詞。

span.span: The object used to resolve namespace prefixes.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用指定的 物件傳回項目值，做為指定的型別，以解析命名空間前置詞。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

returns.span: 項目值，做為要求的型別。

span.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中覆寫方法會嘗試將項目值轉換成[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定型別。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified. 物件用來解析命名空間前置詞與類型轉換。The object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. 例如，當轉換`xs:QName`至`xs:string`。For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`. 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

exception.span: 項目值的格式對於目標型別不正確。

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

related.span: System.Xml 類別中的型別支援

span.span: Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

public: abstract property bool ValueAsBoolean { bool get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會嘗試將項目值轉換成[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]根據 XPath 2.0 規則的項目類型轉換的型別。The property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type. 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the type.
The attempted cast to is not valid.

public: abstract property Type ^ ValueType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得項目的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]型別。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中覆寫屬性會取得[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]項目的具類型值的類型。When overridden in a derived class, the property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item. 例如，類型的元素`xs:int`會有的預設。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 不過，可能是任何一個可以對應到有效型別`xs:int`，例如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

para.span: 所有實作者必須提供屬性的每個項目，即使只是。

span.span: All implementers must provide a property for every item, even if it is only .

related.span: System.Xml 類別中的型別支援

span.span: Type Support in the System.Xml Classes
